TopicTitle: Kerbin Movie Association Video Archive! Post your videos here & GET NOTICED & rated!

Articles.Content:
Hello there, K.M.A.V.A. (Kerbin Movie Association Video Archive) director here,

I have found a solution for "Everyone is watching that guy's stuff when they should look at my stuff instead" problem.

Reply to this thread with a video you have made (or channel, or both), OR feedback on someone's video! (Please quote or mention the person you are talking to).

If you want, ask me to rate your video (i'll PM you first with a review so you know what i'll post).

I will categorize videos on the subject they belong in, and display newest, popular-est, or most featured videos at the front (but not for long, to be fair ).

Please take a look at all the videos in each section, not just one. You never know if you'll find something really cool!

KSP STUFF ONLY.

If you make many videos I might just list your channel and keep only recent videos you've posted in the sections they belong in.

Channels and authors:

YCG Gaming (me): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYVGhtBPL1bWG7V8UyLC93g

iKerbals: https://www.youtube.com/user/iKerbals

Comedy channels:

YCG Gaming (me): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYVGhtBPL1bWG7V8UyLC93g

Documentary channels:

Cinematic channels:

Exploration channels:

Sciency stuff channels:

Tutorial channels:

Other channels (or mixes of what's above):

Eric Schwein: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvBTAwjzkgG49IXJfP28Xaw

Your videos will be listed as your own and I'll try to prevent someone from copying or taking content from a video should that happen. I will try to maintain the links here so that people can see your videos.

If your video is very inappropriate or very bad or anything like that, or is extremely unpopular or if it violates someone's copyright then it will be removed or not posted here.

Edited August 9, 2014 by It'snorocketscience
Added MOAR details.

Are you looking for channels, playlists, or individual videos?

The main reason I ask, is that I made several videos, some are cinematic, and others are tutorials. But they're still a small fraction of my channel, since I post lots of other things (non-KSP, and non-gaming) there too.

Just looking for KSP stuff. Also, I'm looking for playlists, individual videos, and channels.

Edited June 18, 2014 by It'snorocketscience
Fixed a mistake.

Hey check out my channel, iKerbals on YouTube! I have a few cinematics, have been to everywhere and back, and am currently doing an extra planetary launchpads laythe colony with the KSO mod.

https://www.youtube.com/user/iKerbals

Okay, I'll put down the most recent videos you have made (past month) for each category. I'll put down your channel too! Thanks for being the first to post his channel here!

Unfortunately i am very busy right now. I'll list your videos later when i'm not busy. Sorry about that. But I was able to list your channel.

I also have no idea how this thread got back to the "newest posts" area.

I'll now update this thread.
